DataElement.preferredName: Unresectable Due To Locally Advanced Disease Discovered During Surgery Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record data related to being unable to remove a part of the body and to find out cancer that has spread from where it started to nearby tissue or lymph nodes during surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Unresectable Due To Locally Advanced Disease Discovered During Surgery
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Unable to be removed with surgery._Caused by or resulting from._Cancer that has spread from where it started to nearby tissue or lymph nodes._A procedure to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present.  An operation._See for the first time; identify._At some point in a given period of time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Unable to be removed with surgery.

Concepts.definition: Not capable of being removed by surgery.

Property.preferredName: Due To Locally Advanced Malignant Neoplasm Discover During Surgery
Property.preferredDefinition: Caused by or resulting from.:Cancer that has spread from where it started to nearby tissue or lymph nodes.:See for the first time; identify.:At some point in a given period of time.:A procedure to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present.  An operation.

Concepts.definition: A malignant neoplasm that has spread from its original site of growth to nearby tissues or lymph nodes.
See for the first time; identify.
At some point in a given period of time.
A procedure to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present.  An operation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
